verbs.description: [V: According] to job approval ratings in state polls , Trump has lost a lot of steam in the heartland states that lifted him to the White House , and is n’t that popular in many “ Trump 2016 ” states with competitive House and Senate races this year .

According to job approval ratings in state polls , Trump [V: has] lost a lot of steam in the heartland states that lifted him to the White House , and is n’t that popular in many “ Trump 2016 ” states with competitive House and Senate races this year .
